H0.text: What is the family home of the Spencer family for over 500 years. Blenheim Palace

H3.text: What is the family home of the Spencer family for over 500 years. Althorp

A4.text: It has been held by the Spencer family for more than 500 years

A5.text: By 1508, John Spencer purchased Althorp estate with the funds generated from his family's sheep-rearing business
